Posts.Content:
Lori
You definetly need to go thru all the steps to determine if you have bc. With my lump, when I had my first mamo after the doc examined the lump, the lady that did my mammo told me if my lump hurt, which it did, it probably wasn't cancer. Well, she was wrong. It was cancer. You can't really go by any set rule, anything is possible. I hope you the best, but like everyone says, just because you are diagnosed with bc isn't the end of the world. It is treatable. Hang in there.
Posts.Title: found a lump - have a question

Posts.Content:
Janis, my name is Tammy and I will be starting radiation in approx. 3 weeks. I'm really nervous about
 what to expect. I just finished chemo last week. I hope you do well. Maybe we can compare side effects sometime. I hope everyone is right and the time will go by fast for us. Hang in there and hopefully I'll talk to you soon.
Posts.Title: Just started rads with week
there's lots of us, aren't there?

Posts.Content: Good news, I'm so glad for you, I got results from my tests back today, too. Of course, I'm a newbie too, so i haven't been thru anything like you have. But glad to hear you are boring.
Posts.Title: Got the results from my tests today.......

Posts.Content:
Nature's Spirit
It's ok to cry in front of anyone, especially family. Don't try to be superwoman. Also, you can rant and rave here and we've all been there. I'm fairly new to this. I just had surgery three weeks ago. A lumpectomy and two lymph nodes removed. They got all the cancer, I do have to go thru chemo, but my prognosis is good. So even if it is malignant, it's not the end of the world. Waiting is the hardest part, but it gets easier once you know, even if it is bad. Then you at least know what you are dealing with and things will start happening and they will take care of the problem and you'll be on your way to being cancer free!!! Hugs and prayers
Posts.Title: This time tommorrow

Posts.Content:
Hi
As far as posting at 3am I just got home from work. I work 6pm to 3am so i was up anyway. I did sleep good last night, just exhausted i guess. My doc gave me ambien just yesterday to help me sleep. I'm glad to hear it works. I tried Benadryl and it worked just the opposite on me. I guess it's the unknown side effects that is really worrying me. I'm expecting the worse as i always do. I hope mine is easy too. I do know I'm not taking care of myself like i should, as far as rest and eating right, i have to start doing that to keep up my strength. Also, my surgeon doc is sending me to physical therapy for my arm. I haven't been using it like i should because it hurts, darn it! but i have to start getting more use out of it or it won't be good. I"ve been babying it too much, I still don't have much range of motion but it's getting better. You guys are such a big help to me, I really appreciate you. I'll talk to you later. Hugs and prayers
Posts.Title: good news too

Posts.Content: I finally got my drain tube out this past Monday.Â  Hurt like you know what
Posts.Title: hey guys

Posts.Content: I'm thinking about you and praying! Hang in there!
Posts.Title: Tests all done, now I wait....

Posts.Content: I wanted to tell all you guys thanks for all the support and hopeful words.Â  It helps a lot.Â  ItÂ helps to know that I'm not alone in this.Â  And I have people to talk to who have been thru the same thing.Â  So...hugs to everyone
Posts.Title: addendum to last post

Posts.Content: Hey everybody.Â  My doc called today and they've moved my surgeon appt up from jan 12 to dec 22, next wednesday.Â  That scares me!Â Â  I'm trying to be positive, it's hard.Â  I love this place where we can come to and get things off our chests and have people listen who understand where I'm coming from, what I'm feeling, why I'm scared...it's great.Â  I'm trying not to worry until I know something for sure, then I'm gonna start fightin!!!!Â Â  I'll let you guys know anything new and I'll be in just to check on you guys and chat.Â  I intend to stay in contact even if mine turns out to be ok.Â Â Â Â  Thanks you guys for all the encouraging words.....means a lot to me.
Posts.Title: maybe not good news

Posts.Content: I was also told that painful lumps are usually cysts, mine turned out to be stage II cancer.Â  Removed lump and two lymph nodes, they say they got it all, but I still have to have chemo and radiation.Â  Please check it out as soon as possible.Â  We care!
Posts.Title: Cysts / Painful breasts

Posts.Content: Please send my prayers to Luci, also.Â  I don't know the circumstances but my prayers are with her.
Posts.Title: Luci is in the hospital....Prayers please !!

Posts.Content:
Hey guys
Thanks for the encouraging words and making me laugh. Nature's Spirit thanks for the cyber teddy bear. MK I've been patient about test results because the onc told me he doubts that it has spread. I just don't think about it. Rita, I love your idea of pacman going after cancer cells. That was funny! I will keep visualizing that during my chemo! Candy, I know I'm not superwoman but I hate not being able to do whatever I want to. I'm not used to that. Teresa, I like your idea of kicking cancer in the butt!!!! That's a good one, too.
Thanks for all you guys. You've been great. I'll let you know more later.
Hugs and prayers to all
Posts.Title: hey guys

Posts.Content: Thank you guys so much for the emails.Â  They made my day. I've heard the same things from some of my other friends who are trying to reassure me.Â  It is around 3:30 am central time on Wednesday morning and I've been awake since Monday around noon.Â  Is this normal?Â  I went to the doc on Monday and she's sending me to a surgeon.Â  My mammo is Tuesday the 14th and surgeon is thurs. 16th, that's next week.Â  I'm relieved I don't have to wait weeks! Anyway, thanks again for you guys.Â
Posts.Title: Thank you guys so much.

Posts.Content: I'll be doing that soon, too.Â  I'm waiting to hear this morning when my surgeon's appt is and when my mammo is.Â  I hope it's soon.Â  I don't know if I can wait very long without going crazy.Â
Posts.Title: blindsided by first mammo
